thread.title_full: AFA Sales Specialist - Atlanta - Sports Equipment

title: AFA Sales Specialist - Atlanta - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-23-2015 Brief Job Description: Execute our Philosophies to promote and maintain our image with in territory. Direct sales of Apparel, Footwear and Accessories though excellent planning and execution   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
